DOC.brief_summary: The aim study 'Live - without diabetes ' investigate effect increase physical activity daily basis without ( high intense interval training ) HIIT ( short intense : 3 minute per week ) 12 week risk individual pre-diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: A total 125 individual pre-diabetes include randomized four different group ( N=25 , group ) : 1 ) Increased daily activity detect pedometer , 2 ) increase daily activity detect pedometer + HIIT , 3 ) HIIT , 4 ) increase daily activity detect pedometer + group intervention 5 ) control group ( maintain unchanged activity life-style duration study ) .
DOC.criteria: Body mass index ( BMI ) > 25 kg/m2 Prediabetes : 6.1 % ≤ glycated hemoglobin A1c ( HbA1c ) ≤ 6.4 % / increase fast plasma glucose ( FPG ) : 6.1 mM ≤ FPG ≤ 6.9 mM / abnormal glucose tolerance ( 7.8 mM ≤ 2 hour plasma glucose ( PG ) ≤ 11.0 mmol ) Weekly training status < 150 minute BMI < 25 kg/m2 Diabetes Pregnancy breastfeed Treatment medicine , influence glucose metabolism Decreased liver function ( liver transaminase > 3 time limit normal )
